pages.text: You can bind a crystal using either of these two options: the $(l:utils/rebinding_reagent)Rebinding Reagent$(/l) or $(l:crystals/life_crystal)Life Crystal$(/l) Binding.$(br2)$(l)Rebinding Reagent$()$(br)You can simply craft a $(l:utils/rebinding_reagent)Rebinding Reagent$(/l), right click it to bind it to yourself, then craft the bound $(l:utils/rebinding_reagent)Rebinding Reagent$(/l) with a bound crystal.

$(l)Life Crystal Binding$()$(br)You can simply craft a $(l:crystals/life_crystal)Life Crystal$(/l) with a bound crystal to bind it to the player the $(l:crystals/life_crystal)Life Crystal$(/l) is bound to.
